short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upgrade your Crewlist experience on Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crewlist for Chrome uses the Crewlist network to enhance your email system; automatically find contact details for filmmakers with the following online email systems:
• Gmail
• Yahoo Mail (in development)
• Outlook (in development)
